actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require high-ranking officers to provide adequate disclosure of debts.
short_title: Debt Disclosure for Officials in Government Act

summary.text:
Debt Disclosure for Officials in Government Act

This bill requires the President, Vice President, and certain presidential appointees to disclose more detailed debt information, including with respect to the liabilities of private companies in which the individual or the individual's spouse or child is a beneficial owner.

titles.title: Debt Disclosure for Officials in Government Act
Debt Disclosure for Officials in Government Act
A bill to amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require high-ranking officers to provide adequate disclosure of debts.
